availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Caleb Hitch (Pendleton County, Ky, enslaved man)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Ann Southgate. Father of John Hitch, Susan Hitch, and William Hitch. Formerly enslaved by Robert Hamilton Hitch. Enslaved by Mary "Polly" Ann Southgate from 1859 to 1865. Resident of Pendleton County in 1859 and 1860. Resident of Pendleton County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 190A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 408B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 20223.
KYR-0001-004-1722.
KYR-0001-020-0133.
